data.text: The restaurant on the ground floor nearby the reception, its name is “foodie” : the staff was eating food nonstop and everyone I come there someone from F&B team was chewing the food in their mouse and speaking to me. Additionally, there is no one at the restaurant when you come there to eat. Very low quality of service and standards. Some staff was weird , to be honest lots of trainings are required to F&B personal. One time I came for breakfast and there was no clean table at all, it was only 8:00am - many times I’ve heard restaurant workers complaining about their job and commenting things loudly - it’s not acceptable for hotel type of accommodation. Very disappointing. Room was specious and cleaning was fine. The recommendation: please wash window curtains at least once per week . It’s very dusty and dirty . Same with sofa in the living room, you can see many spots on it and I had no desire to seat there even. Bedroom was ok. Very loud music in the hallway on the floors - I could hear inside my room the outdoor sound. I won’t come back there . Please take it as a constructive suggestion for improvements. Thanks !
data.title: Disappointed expirience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

I apologize for the difficulties you experienced during your recent stay at Time Onyx Hotel Apartments. Your feedback is highly valuable to us and helps us identify areas where we can improve our services.

I am truly sorry to hear about your unsatisfactory experience in the restaurant and the issues you faced in your room. It is evident that we did not meet your expectations during your stay, and for that, I am sorry.

At our hotel, we prioritize the comfort and satisfaction of our guests, and it is disappointing to know that we failed to meet these expectations in your case. We will review your feedback with our team to ensure that such issues are addressed promptly and resolved.

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again, and make your stay much more pleasant.

Sincerely, 
Karim Ellecy
General Manager
owner_response.author: Rechil Valenzuela

data.text:
The Time Onyx Hotel Apartments was a fantastic stay, from the comfortable rooms to the amazing service!! Staff are friendly and helpful.
I had such a great time; I will come back again!
I definitely recommend it to everyone.
#YouReallyMatter
data.title: It was my first time in UAE and I was very happy to stay at this hotel.

data.text: It was clean, stylish, roomy with excellent service . Food was good and great value for money and service was attentive and efficient. Special thanks to the Arabic lady  Chef  Ms Samira: Your cooking is absolutely delicious! You have a real talent for creating amazing flavors and textures. I always look forward to enjoying your meals
data.title: Amazing

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

First of all, thank you for choosing TIME Onyx Hotel Apartments. We appreciate the time you took to write a review. It is only through our valuable customer’s feedback that we can maintain and more important improve the levels of customer service that we aspire to provide.

We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found our services up to your satisfaction and standards.

Rest assured that your positive comments will be shared with our team members, which will encourage them to maintain their efforts and improve our quality of service every day.

It is always a pleasure to have you as our guests and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Sincerely, 
Karim Ellecy
Cluster General Manager
